recipe.title: Cranberry Orange Relish
ingredients: 2 Gala, Fuji, or Red Delicious apples, chopped
instructions: Cut peel and white pith from oranges and cut segments free from membranes. Coarsely chop, discarding any seeds.
Pulse fruit with allspice and 1/2 cup sugar in batches in a food processor until coarsely chopped. Transfer to a bowl and stir in sugar to taste.
